name: Very Simple PayPal Donation Form
author: Aaron Hodge Silver

sections.description: Put a simple PayPal donation form on any post or page with a shortcode. The form has buttons for quick donation amounts, the option to enter your own amount, and the option to choose a one-time or monthly recurring donation.
sections.installation:
1. Install either via the WordPress.org plugin directory, or by uploading the files to your server.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Use the shortcode [vsdf_donation_form] on any page!
sections.faq:
What if I want a new feature?

Ask me! I may add it for you.
sections.changelog:
1.3

  • You can now specify a currency symbol to display on the form.

1.2

  • You can now specify currency.

1.1

  • Consolidated more functionality into classes.
  • Added settings for PayPal Email and Extra CSS.
  • Cleaned up front-end css.

1.0

  • Initial custom build. Functional but not customizable.
